space_1.name: 1 — Earth Satellite
space_1.body: Requires 2+ Ops. Roll 1-3 to succeed. First player: +2 VP.

space_2.name: 2 — Animal in Space
space_2.body: Requires 2+ Ops. Roll 1-4 to succeed. First player: +0 VP.

space_3.name: 3 — Man in Space
space_3.body: Requires 2+ Ops. Roll 1-3 to succeed. First player: +2 VP.
space_3.details: Ability: You may play 2 cards to the Space Race per turn (instead of 1).

space_4.name: 4 — Man in Earth Orbit
space_4.body: Requires 2+ Ops. Roll 1-4 to succeed. First player: +0 VP.
space_4.details: Ability: Your opponent shows you their headline card before you choose yours.

space_5.name: 5 — Lunar Orbit
space_5.body: Requires 3+ Ops. Roll 1-3 to succeed. First player: +3 VP.
space_5.details: No additional ability gained beyond previous spaces.

space_6.name: 6 — Eagle/Bear Has Landed
space_6.body: Requires 3+ Ops. Roll 1-4 to succeed. First player: +0 VP.
space_6.details: Ability: You may discard one held card when you receive your new hand. You draw a replacement immediately.

space_7.name: 7 — Space Station
space_7.body: Requires 3+ Ops. Roll 1-3 to succeed. First player: +4 VP.
space_7.details: No additional ability gained beyond previous spaces.

space_8.name: 8 — Space Shuttle / SEI
space_8.body: Requires 4+ Ops. Roll 1-2 to succeed. First player: +2 VP.
space_8.details: Ability: May take 8 action rounds per turn (instead of the normal 6 or 7).
